name: Hyperdrive Hazard
description:
----------------------------

Warning: epilepsy hazard possible

-----------------------

Most of the time space travel is boring... 

Dynamically leaded by music, this 2d shooter propose to play in an Hazardous hyperdrive. Okay... the gameplay is a little messy, but , you know, hyperdrive is not an exact science until there.

Use mouse left clic, move around to aim, Play it in full screen

and

Put the sound volume hight !
